Html.name: Html0
Html.content: While the first part of the URL of the detail view of an article is quite clear, it is the detail page's URL, the last, content-specific part, that is not that obvious. In the demo, it is generated from the article's Title elements. This behavior is configured in the content type definition of the article. In the <appinfo>-part, a mapping from the Title element to urlName is configured:
